text: Two ships of the United States Navy have been named USS Pyro. * , the lead ship of the Pyro-class ammunition ships was commissioned 10 August 1920 and decommissioned 10 September 1924. She was later recommissioned 1 July 1939, decommissioned 12 June 1946 and scrapped in 1948 * , a Nitro-class ammunition ship was commissioned 24 July 1959, decommissioned 31 May 1994 and scrapped in 2012 in NOLA Category:United States Navy ship names
title: USS Pyro
